elements.title: Cyprian Norwid (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the 19th-century poet Cyprian Norwid (pictured), now recognized as one of the most important Polish poets, led a poverty-stricken life and his works were rarely appreciated until decades after his death?

elements.title: Temple of Piety (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that ancient Rome's Temple of Piety was closely connected with the legend of a daughter who breastfed an imprisoned parent?

elements.title: Paul Needham (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the librarian Paul Needham has argued for the "respectful burial of the human remains" included in a book bound in human skin?

elements.title: Solution and EU Party (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Solution and EU Party aimed to represent 30 percent of Turkish Cypriots, but failed to enter the Northern Cypriot parliament?

elements.title: their 2020 season (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Seattle Sounders FC players held their practices over Zoom during part of their 2020 season?

elements.title: No Saint (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that according to Rolling Stone, Lauren Jenkins blended music and acting for No Saint "in ways not currently common practice" in country music?

elements.title: Thorfinn (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Thorfinn's journey to Vinland in the manga Vinland Saga was influenced by the author's anxieties during the Cold War and the September 11 attacks?

elements.title: bicolor molly (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the bicolor molly inevitably goes off the deep end in adulthood?
